   contain the root `toctree` directive.

欢迎使用pasta处理数据需求！
========================

洋葱数学数据需求处理组件pasta文档，主要由中文写成。  

This documentation is about Yangcong Data Requirement ToolKit ``pasta``. The main part of the doc is written by Chinese.

----
